thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 26 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Mobileiron Inc Q1 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.17

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Mobileiron Inc Q1 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.17
text:
April 26 (Reuters) - MobileIron Inc:
* MOBILEIRON ANNOUNCES FIRST QUARTER 2018 RESULTS * Q1 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.06
* Q1 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.17 * Q1 REVENUE $43.7 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $43.8 MILLION
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.07 â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES Q2 2018 REVENUE $43 MILLION TO $46 MILLION * QTRLY BILLINGS WERE $46.0 MILLION, UP 1% YEAR-OVER-YEAR
* SEES Q2 BILLINGS ARE EXPECTED TO BE BETWEEN $46 MILLION AND $49 MILLION
* SEES Q2 NON-GAAP GROSS MARGIN IS EXPECTED TO BE BETWEEN 84% AND 85%
* SEES 2018 BILLINGS ARE EXPECTED TO BE BETWEEN $210 MILLION AND $220 MILLION Source text for Eikon:
